content: I cannot promise rapid weight loss as it's not healthy or sustainable in the long run. however, following a healthy meal plan like the one i recommended, in combination with regular exercise, can help you achieve gradual and healthy weight loss. quick weight loss is often not sustainable, can lead to nutrient deficiencies, and may even damage your metabolism. it's important to focus on making sustainable lifestyle changes that you can maintain in the long run. gradual weight loss of 1-2 pounds per week is considered safe and achievable.
